summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Jackson Street, from 1st Avenue South to 2nd Avenue as established by Ordinance No. 50867, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6304 of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and repealing Ordinance No. 44955, approved April 17th, 1923.
